original_title: Three Times Moving: A Time to Lie
overview: In the second in a trilogy of short films that follow Time Stops Moving  and Time Always Moving, and continue where Three Times Moving:  The Kiss Through Time left off- Anna confronts Julie on her  contradictory lies and love for Adam.  Starring Jane Hogan as “Julie”, Lee Neville as “Adam” and  Danielle Little as “Anna”.
tagline: Between one truth and another is an unspoken place in which you  Will find a time to lie.
title: Three Times Moving: A Time to Lie
